title: Name
summary: A string value representing the name (text) of the menu item.

parameters.description: An expression that identifies a menu item in a menu, for example `menuItem "Undo" of menu "Edit"`.
An expression that evaluates to the name of menu item.

title: Command Character
summary: A single character representing the accelerator key (the `command` or `control`-key sequence that can be typed to execute the command). Note that only command/control-key accelerators are supported; you cannot combine with shift or other keys. If more than one character is specified, the first character in the value will be used.

parameters.description: An expression that identifies a menu item in a menu, for example `menuItem "Undo" of menu "Edit"`.
An expression that evaluates to the command character.

title: Enabled
summary: A boolean value representing whether the menu item is enabled (selectable).

parameters.description: An expression that identifies a menu item in a menu, for example `menuItem "Undo" of menu "Edit"`.
An expression that evaluates to either true or false.

title: Checkmark
summary: A boolean value indicating whether the menu has a checkmark next to it.

parameters.description: An expression that identifies a menu item in a menu, for example `menuItem "Undo" of menu "Edit"`.
An expression that evaluates to either true or false.
